event.title: 1871 the Toronto and Nipissing Railway was built

data.event: In 1871 the Toronto and Nipissing Railway was built though the flourishing settlement and in 1878 Woodville became a police village.
In 1871 the Toronto and Nipissing Railway was built though the flourishing settlement and in 1878 Woodville became a police village.

event.title: Today, the cheese factory, rail station, gristmill, mechanics shops, and hotels have all been shut

data.event: Today, the cheese factory, rail station, gristmill, mechanics shops, and hotels have all been shut down.

event.title: now is home to a grocery store, three restaurants, two variety stores, a post office, one gas station, a bank, a curling rink and arena, two baseball diamonds and a newer school, first built

data.event: Woodville now is home to a grocery store, three restaurants, two variety stores, a post office, one gas station, a bank, a curling rink and arena, two baseball diamonds and a newer school, first built in 1923.
